articles.title: Bengaluru civic staff 'force' people to take Covid-19 test before vaccination - India Today
articles.description: Staff at various Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike (BBMP) primary health centres allegedly forced people to undergo Covid-19 test before vaccination.

articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Coronavirus vaccine: How side-effects differ in younger people and older people, as per studies - Times of India
articles.description: Side-effects with the vaccine, which are usually said to be inflammatory reactions, could also differ based on gender, one's age and the type of vaccine one gets.

articles.title: Johnson & Johnson says its single-shot COVID-19 vaccine offers durable protection against Delta, other... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The data from Johnson & Johnson showed that the durability of the immune response lasted through at least eight months, the length of time evaluated to date.

articles.title: Covid infection in your pet dogs, cats may be common than thought - Free Press Journal
articles.description: Are you Covid-positive? Stay away from your feline and pooch friends to avoid the risk of passing on the infection to them, suggests a study, which found that infection in pets is more common than thought.

articles.title: Can contraceptive pills cause PCOS? - Times of India
articles.description: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), an endocrine disorder in females, is also a common cause of infertility and skin related problems in females. However, birth control pills that help to avert or contracept unwanted pregnancies are often related to PCOS. Let’s…

articles.title: Lupin gets US FDA nod for SOLOSEC to treat trichomoniasis - Business Standard
